name: Dish Master
description:
(Warning : This game requires an HTC Vive.)

Clean as many dishes as you can in 3 minutes !

Platform : PC

Engine : Unity 5

Number of players : 1

The game was made in two days during the Virtual Game Jam 2017.

The team : 

Rémi Leblanc : Programming

Pierre-Olivier  : Programming

Pierre-Marie  : UI/UX & 3D Art

Mathieu : 3D Art

Valérian : Sound Design & Music
